LanguageData.AnimalGatherSpeed.label: animal gather speed
LanguageData.AnimalGatherSpeed.description: The speed at which this person milks, shears, and otherwise gathers resources from animals.
LanguageData.AnimalGatherYield.label: animal gather yield
LanguageData.AnimalGatherYield.description: The percentage yield someone receives when they shear, milk, or otherwise gather resources from a living animal.\n\nHigher percentages reduce the chance of wasting the product.
LanguageData.ConstructSuccessChance.label: construct success chance
LanguageData.ConstructSuccessChance.description: The chance that this person will succeed in constructing something.\nFailing means wasting time and resources.
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeed.label: construction speed
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeed.description: The speed at which this person constructs and repairs buildings.
LanguageData.DeepDrillingSpeed.label: deep drilling speed
LanguageData.DeepDrillingSpeed.description: A speed at which this person uses a deep drill to extract underground resources.
LanguageData.DrugHarvestYield.label: drug crop harvest yield
LanguageData.DrugHarvestYield.description: The yield this person gets when harvesting drug crops.\n\nLow yields give a chance that this person will accidentally waste the harvest. High yields increase the yield from each plant.
LanguageData.FixBrokenDownBuildingSuccessChance.label: repair success chance
LanguageData.FixBrokenDownBuildingSuccessChance.descr:
The chance that this person will successfully repair a broken down building using a component.

Failing means wasting time and resources.
Note that this only applies to repairing breakdowns, which is different from repairing damage.
LanguageData.HuntingStealth.label: hunting stealth
LanguageData.HuntingStealth.description:
This stat reduces the chance of hunted animals attacking the hunter.

A 0% score means no reduction.
A 100% score means animals never attack.
LanguageData.MiningSpeed.label: mining speed
LanguageData.MiningSpeed.description: A speed at which this person mines away walls.
LanguageData.MiningYield.label: mining yield
LanguageData.MiningYield.description:
The percentage of mined resources a miner will produce.

This applies to both wall mining and deep drill mining.
This doesn't affect the production rate of rock chunks from deep drills.
LanguageData.PlantHarvestYield.label: plant harvest yield
LanguageData.PlantHarvestYield.description: The yield this person gets when harvesting plants.\n\nLow yields give a chance that this person will accidentally waste the harvest.
LanguageData.PlantWorkSpeed.label: plant work speed
LanguageData.PlantWorkSpeed.description: The speed at which this person sows and harvests plants.
LanguageData.ResearchSpeed.label: research speed
LanguageData.ResearchSpeed.description: How fast this person performs research and how quickly they can find things using scanning equipment.
LanguageData.SmoothingSpeed.label: smoothing speed
LanguageData.SmoothingSpeed.description: A multiplier on the speed at which this person smooths rough stone floors and walls.
LanguageData.WorkSpeedGlobal.label: global work speed
LanguageData.WorkSpeedGlobal.description: A multiplier on a character's speed at doing any kind of work.
